Posts.Content: Aug 15, 2014 10:18PM wanderingstar wrote: I also have this problem.  Been living with it for five years.  Have never found anything that helped.  I had trans flap, infection and also had months of wound vac.   Just one problem after another.   I feel for you, because this problem with stomach is harder to live with than the screwed up breast!
